LanguageData.Plantblueberry.label: 블루베리 덤불
LanguageData.Plantblueberry.description: 블루베리 bushes produce 주석y, round, blue colored fruits called blueberries. Blueberries are tasty when eaten raw.
LanguageData.Plantcloudberry.label: 호로딸기 덤불
LanguageData.Plantcloudberry.description: 호로딸기 bushes produce sweet, amber-coloured, raspberry-shaped fruits called cloudberries. 호로딸기 bushes are capable of growing well in cold climates.
LanguageData.Plantgooseberry.label: 구스베리 덤불
LanguageData.Plantgooseberry.description: Gooseberry 덤불 produce small, sweet, somewhat hairy fruits called Gooseberries. Gooseberry bushes can grow in cold climates.
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.label: 코코아 나무
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.description: Cocoa Trees produce seeds in pods that are called Cocoa Beans. Cocoa Beans can be refined into chocolate.
LanguageData.PlantAppletree.label: 사과 나무
LanguageData.PlantAppletree.description: Apple Trees produce round, palm-sized, red fruits called Apples. The Apple Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Apple production.
LanguageData.PlantBananaTree.label: 바나나 나무
LanguageData.PlantBananaTree.description: Banana Trees produce long, yellow fruits called Bananas, which eventually soften into a sweet delight. The Banana Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Banana production.
LanguageData.PlantorangeTree.label: 오렌지 나무
LanguageData.PlantorangeTree.description: Orange Trees produce sweet, citric fruits called Oranges. The Orange Tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of Orange production.
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.label: 복숭아 나무
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.description: Peach trees produce soft, fuzzy, sweet fruits called peaches. The peach tree will remain after harvesting and will start another cycle of peach production.
LanguageData.Plantgrape.label: 포도 덩굴
LanguageData.Plantgrape.description: Grape vines produce small, sweet berries that grow in clusters on a single branch. These fruits are called grapes.
